name: Exolien DEMO
description:
Exolien is an Attack On Titan inspired first person shooter based on movement. Use you grappling hooks to fly around and eliminate your enemies!

Main Features:

1) Jetpack and 2 grappling hooks allow you to move fast and fluid;

2) 3 kinds of weapons: primary, secondary and melle;

3) Racing mode: master movement and be the fastest!

This is DEMO version of the game, created to test the movement mechanics and get some feedback.  The game will be developed further. I hope one day it will become a fully featured multiplayer shooter!

Current Content:

1) Movement system;

2) Sky City level;

3) Racing gamemode;

4) 3 different weapons;

The game was created by a solo game developer AkarFire (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEaVzVDDaIsn4TovmX7OuOQ/featured)
